mapper.select: SELECT QuestionId, UserEmail, UserType, CaseId FROM react_use.questionnaire_mails WHERE GUID = #{Id}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM react_use.questionnaire_mails WHERE QuestionId = #{questionId} and CaseId = #{caseId} and UserType = #{userType}

SELECT questionnaires.Description, questionnaires.Type, questionnaires.ActiveFlag, questionnaires.Order, questionnaires.RequireFlag FROM react_use.questionnaires as questionnaires WHERE questionnaires.PlatformId = #{platformId} and questionnaires.EffectiveDate > CURRENT_DATE() and questionnaires.Open = 1 and questionnaires.ActiveFlag = 1 and questionnaires.QuestionId = #{questionId} Order By questionnaires.Order ASC
